item.description: Welcome to the Metro West Investors Meetup Group. The purpose of this Meetup group is to bring together individuals interested in or actively investing in real estate in Boston's Metro West neighborhoods. Our membership includes new and experienced individuals representing just about every aspect of the Real Estate industry, including real estate brokers, mortgage brokers, attorneys, accountants, designers, general contractors, specialty trades, etc. In addition to our focus in Boston's Metro West, we are also growing in our associations with other REIA's in the area (Real Estate Investors Associations). These connections provide even greater opportunities for networking and learning from the vast experiences of others experts in the industry. Happy Investing!
item.name: Metro West Investors - Boston area Real Estate Group
